body.p: Each tile displays on the dashboard in the order in which it was added, e.g., the first tile added is always on the top-left of the dashboard.
There are two methods of building a new dashboard:

ul.li: Pin a tile to a new dashboard - Click the Pin button () and select Add to new dashboard in the Pin to Dashboard dialogue.

Using the Dashboard Manager - This method allows you to setup a dashboard shell with no tiles initially. Use this method when setting up a dashboard for another owner, setting user view and edit permissions, or as a placeholder for tiles not yet selected.
